articles.author: By Matthew Martinez mmartinez@mcclatchy.com
articles.title: Fired Tijuana judge tried to enter U.S. with 38 pounds of cocaine, court docs say
articles.description: Eduardo Fransisco Sais Peinado, municipal judge in Tijuana, Mexico, arrested by Customs and Border Patrol when federal officials found 11 packages of cocaine in the doors of his Jeep as he attempted to enter U.S. at San Ysidro Port of Entry

articles.title: State Highlights: Medical Company Faces Criminal Charges Following Milwaukee Inmate’s Death; $7.5M Funds Approved in N.J. For Women’s Health
articles.description: Media outlets report on news from Wisconsin, New Jersey, Ohio, Maryland, Minnesota, Florida, Kentucky, Virginia, South Carolina, New York, Missouri, Michigan, Texas, Tennessee, Georgia, Louisiana, California and Massachusetts.

articles.title: Inside the Billion-Dollar Business of Detaining Immigrants
articles.description: The Eloy Detention Center is surrounded by three rows of electrified fence with barbed wire at the top. A dirt road leads to a parking lot some distance from the entrance. When I get out of the car, I walk over the lot covered in pebbles, feeling oddly vulner…

articles.title: A California Dream
